Class DraggableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

              • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.GUI.DraggableComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class DraggableComponent
extends FunctionalLabel
    Class used to define an object that can be moved on the screen, e.g. the familiar
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DraggableComponent

        public DraggableComponent(int x,
                          int y,
                          java.awt.Dimension dimension,
                          java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                          FamiliarColor color)
        Constructor of the draggable familiar
        Parameters:
        x - The x position on screen
        y - The y position on screen
        dimension - The dimension of the component
        image - The image to show in the component
        color - The color of the familiar to load the correct picture

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Getter for the image of the draggable component
        Returns:
        A BufferedImage of the picture shown in the component

      • setCanMove

        public void setCanMove(boolean state)
        Method used to enable the motion of the component
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the component. If the state is True, then you can move the component, else you can't move the component on the screen
